descriptionHtml:
Beast Races now punch instead of clawing.

That's really all I have to say. If you want to mod this file that's fine. No need for credit (Unless you're just re-upping my mod. Then you have to give me credit)

Don't forget to endorse!

If you want me to create other versions of the file (I.E. keep some of the animations like clawing for power attacks or something) post in the comments.

Also, i've been informed on Facepunch that i've been beaten to the punch by [url=http://facepunch.com/member.php?u=68486][color=#A06000]Chilean_Wolf[/color][/url], so if you want a similar mod, except on the steam workshop, go to here

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=156660140]Boopity Bloop[/url]ï»¿

v.1
author: ClarkWasHere
